import React,{useState} from 'react'; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import {Form, Button,FormCheck, FormGroup, FormControl, ControlLabel } from "react-bootstrap"; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import './Register.css'; const Register = () => { const history = useHistory(); async function handleSubmit (event) { event.preventDefault() fetch('http://localhost:8080/api/auth/Register', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify({ email, name, studentid, mobile, }), }) .then((res)=>{ return res.json() }) .then((data)=>{ console.log(data); }) //.then(response => response.json()) } const [name, setName] = useState('') const [studentid, setSid] = useState('') const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [mobile, setMobile] = useState('') return ( <>

Please fill the Grievance Form:-

note that (*) are mandatory fields

Name* setName(e.target.value)} /> Student ID* setSid(e.target.value)} /> Email* setEmail(e.target.value)} /> Mobile* setMobile(e.target.value)} /> Grievance Category* Department Grievance Subject* Grievance Description*
) } export default Register
